about_the_game:
A family friendly, mysterious adventure in the form of an interactive fairy tale.
Made to help anyone to get a foot into the genre of adventure games, the game gradually introduces and explains new game mechanics, similar to many other adventure games.

- Find and explore Myr in the middle of an old forest: No person has ever come back from Myr, the City of Lights.
- Jasper's big sister Nora has disappeared and is thought to be missing in the forest.
- On his quest to find Nora, Jasper is being accompanied by his friend, a little star that fell out of the sky and guides Jasper's way.
- Help Jasper find his way through the forest, protect Jasper from the icy cold fog that seeps through the forest and gets colder the closer Jasper gets to the city of Myr.
- Together Jasper and you will become Lightwalkers, bringing the frozen forest back to life, rescuing the Whispering Souls who have fallen victim to the cold.

Gameplay features currently include:
- Narrated storyline of Jasper, including an illustrated book that the Narrator is reading from.
- Exploration of the world and lore of the Forbidden Forest and Myr.
- Melt the ice and snow with the magic power of Jasper's little star to bring the world back to life.

Jasper is in active development, on top of the Prologue there are 4 Chapters planned, telling Jasper's and Nora's story and introducing a world full of lore and mystery.

Jasper is free to play, all content will be unlockable in-game, although it will take a little more involvement into the game than just playing Jasper's main storyline. Purchasing of the chapters is encouraged to support the development, however please note that content and features will be added over time.

You can help the development of Jasper by posting your feedback, issues, ideas, etc to the Community Hub Forums.
Updates to the game will be published in a cycle of 1-2 months.
detailed_description:
Roadmap

Jasper is currently in active development, which means, there is still a lot to come, but also that it will take time (It's currently just me working on the project). The main platform for community-side development of Jasper is here on Steam. I am very active in the community hub and forums, please feel free to ask questions or make suggestions!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2.4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card with 2GB or more
  • Storage: 2.4 GB available space

short_description: Let me tell you a story my friend. It is the journey of Jasper into the whispering forest to find his sister Nora. In the deepest of shadows an ancient spirit is lurking but there’s hope shining from the horizon: The City of Lights.
